definition: to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: Do we require of our writers to fight the system?
sentences.chinese: 我們要求我們的作家去和體制抗爭麼？

sentences.english: When Washington ordered troops into the area, the opposition collapsed without a fight.
sentences.chinese: 在華盛頓下令軍隊開進該地區時，抗爭者不戰而散。

sentences.english: And you don’t do it by fighting it. You do it by surrendering to it.
sentences.chinese: 但是並非通過與之抗爭，而是向之屈服。

sentences.english: Because she played a feminine image of weakness.
sentences.chinese: 因爲她飾演了一個無力抗爭的女性形象。

sentences.english: They simply threatened to filibuster until the Senate adjourns.
sentences.chinese: 他們僅威脅說要發動抗爭直到參議院休會。

sentences.english: He chose to protest by way of self-immolation.
sentences.chinese: 他選擇通過自焚來表示抗爭。

sentences.english: The struggling spirit influenced Lu Xun's thoughts and his creation.
sentences.chinese: 這種抗爭精神也深深地影響了魯迅的思想和創作。

sentences.english: Only then will there be real progress in the battle against cyclones.
sentences.chinese: 只有那時，與颶風抗爭的戰鬥才能獲得實質性的進展。

sentences.english: He promised to continue the fight against infidel forces.
sentences.chinese: 他允諾繼續與無宗教信仰力量的抗爭。

sentences.english: The scientists are trying to come up with novel methods to fight with malaria.
sentences.chinese: 科學家們正嘗試想出很多新奇地方法來與瘧疾抗爭。

sentences.english: In Apia, though, opponents are determined to fight the change.
sentences.chinese: 然而在阿皮亞，反對者已經下定決心要抗爭下去。

sentences.english: He also struggled to leave his rigid scientific training behind.
sentences.chinese: 他也抗爭着把死板的科學課程丟在一邊。

sentences.english: Millions of years we fought gravity.
sentences.chinese: 億萬年來我們一直在和重力抗爭。

sentences.english: This thesis attempts to explore the spiritual salvation of black slaves in the novel.
sentences.chinese: 這部小說講述黑奴悲慘境遇和抗爭的小說。

sentences.english: When we lose a love, for instance, we fight our feelings of heartbreak.
sentences.chinese: 例如，當我們失戀時，我們與心碎的悲痛感抗爭。

definition: to make a supreme effort/at all costs
to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
